mapper.insert: insert into board_table(boardTitle, boardWriter, boardContents, fileAttached) values (#{boardTitle}, #{boardWriter}, #{boardContents}, #{fileAttached})
insert into board_file_table(originalFileName, storedFileName, boardId) values (#{originalFileName}, #{storedFileName}, #{boardId})
mapper.select: select id, boardTitle, boardWriter, boardHits, date_format(createdAt, "%y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s") as createdAt from board_table where ${type} like concat('%',#{query},'%') order by id desc limit #{start},#{limit}
select count(*) from board_file_table where boardId=#{boardId}
select count(*) from board_table where ${type} like #{query}
